Shantanu Mukhopadhyay PM O PR OF ESSI ONA L Details G - 601, Amrapali Princely Estate, Sector - 76, Noida, 201301, India +91 9868244051 shantanu9th@gmail.com DATE / P LA CE OF BIR TH 1st November, 1993 Kolkata NA TI ONA LI TY Indian Skills Program project management Process Management Financial / T M Material projects Resource Management Different types of Financial Billing/Invoice Validation Space utilization PAN India/Future Assignments Project support Compliance and Operations Audit for Production support Internal SLA Reporting Staffing/Client Onboarding formalities/BGV/access rights management External/Internal Leading activities related to PMO SharePoint - Document maintenance Profile Resourceful, proactive, and highly motivated professional targeting assignments in the field of Project Management, Resource/People Management, Maintenance Quality Assurance. Sound knowledge of different types of billing and revenue analysis along with invoice validation, timesheet management and tracking, Good hands-on experience on operations audits and compliance related parameters. Exposure to working in banking projects. Proficient in root cause analysis to determine core reason for failures and errors. Productive employee with proven track record of successful project management and producing quality outcomes through leadership and team motivation. Works with clients to determine requirements and provide excellent service. Employment History Deputy Project Manager PMO at WIPRO, Noida MAY 2022 Project / Iteration / Delivery planning and execution - Partners with Client, Business Leaders and Team including Wipro Technology / Operation leads / LSA / SA / PTMs / Practice Managers / Health Leaders and other support groups for Client or Client Delivery group to plan, execute, monitor, control, report Project / Delivery / Iteration deliverables Change Management: - Identifies and understands the change. Plans and prepares self and the team to navigate for effective implementation of change - Effectively communicates through the change management process and reinforces behaviors toward the desired state - Sustains the change through identified metrics, assigned ownership, and a procedure for monitoring and addressing slippages Stakeholder and Relationship Management: - Develops strong working relationships with Team, Client and Business leaders and works closely on development and achievement of strategic objectives. - Displays strong business acumen to address escalations with business stakeholders, and facilitates an open, constructive dialogue with stakeholders on key issues and risks. - Utilizes strong oral and written communication skills to effectively communicate at multiple levels of the organization and with external partners, both technical and business aligned. Issue Risk Management: - Proactively identifies and implements risk mitigation strategies and aggressively manages the resolution of issues. - Facilitates actions to remove risks/issues/barriers outside of the meeting. Quality Management: - Sets/ shares quality expectations and goals for the team. - Owns the continuous improvement agenda for aligned clients. - Perform operational and compliance audits with the team. People Management - Nurturing the team: - Builds relationships, assesses performance, provides career and development coaching, manages pay, and improves colleague engagement. Timesheet Compliance on Weekly basis in Clarity PPM tool Creating WBS / Allocating resources to WBS Maintain Track contract agreements - SOW, MSA, PO To prepare resource utilization report Billable / Non-Billable. Hobbies Driving, Passion to learn something new, exploring new type of cuisines across various food joints/outlets. Languages English Hindi Bengali - Developing colleagues through helping them create meaningful Individual Development Plan - Keeps abreast of company policies, educates team and ensures that policies are being adhered to. - Ensures team members have a learning/training plan where re-skilling and skill broadening is needed. - Energizes the team by setting goals and ways to motivate the team to do great work and drives improvement of overall team performance. - Retention - Creates channels for colleague retention and career opportunities - Colleague Engagement: Adheres to defined Colleague Connect routines - Builds Talent pipeline and create succession plans for key role. Program and Project Management Senior Analyst at NTT Data Services, Noida NOV EMB ER 2021 MA Y 2022 Mobilizing the program/project which includes implementation of project management tools and project control processes, procedures and policies. Monitoring and control of the program/project throughout the project life- cycle. Performance reporting and program/project governance. Project Financial Tracking and Reporting. Program/project close-down assistance to the Delivery team related to Banking Projects. Set up and configure MS Project Server and Project Web Access. Support Work Plan generation. Support Status Report generation. Track actual on a weekly basis, including time-sheet creation, time-sheet completion compliance, and time-sheet approval compliance using PPM tools such as Clarity and Synergy time-sheet tracking. Perform resource reporting such as roll-on, roll-off, overtime, and resource utilization. Monthly Financial Billing. Support the resource management, such as demand/supply tracker and maintain the team list. Support deliverables management, support deliverable approval process and maintain the deliverables repository. Support Risk and Issue Management Senior Executive PMO at HCL Technologies, Noida APRIL 2020 NOV EMB ER 2021 Interacting with project /delivery team regularly to understand the requirement. To coordinate with delivery managers for transaction completion. Working on Revenue forecast and budgeting, billing, project initiation, revenue analysis, inventory CAPEX and other activities related to project management and preparing the reports in Excel. Preparing weekly and monthly reports and presentations regarding resource assignations in MS-Excel and MS-PowerPoint for every off- boarding and on-boarding of the resource in the project. Currently responsible for sorting and filtering data on weekly resource requisitions reports in Excel and hiring details against the number of resources offered. Capturing and recording important data Proactive follow ups with the concerned stakeholders such as Finance and invoicing team for end-to-end closure of project transactions. Coordinating with different support teams and tracking at Senior management level regarding the open action items pending. Billing coordination and Unbilled analysis report and presenting the data to the leadership further using ppt. Resource management and utilization report generation and analysis. Staff attrition analysis and governance report. Resource tracker/Visa Tracker. Project details reporting and sharing the updates on the ppt presentations. Chasing on required mandatory training and other e-learning modules to maintain project compliance. On-boarding/Off-boarding/Background verification. Asset management. ODC access and seat management in the project. CSAT Survey tracking. Audit preparation, collating data for compliance audits and client-audit presentation. Working on value added activities such as knowledge based updated and self-development. To resolve tickets within agreed SLA of ticket volume and time. To adhere to quality standards, regulatory requirements, and company policies. Senior Product Support Consultant PMO at Honeywell presently Resideo , Gurgaon OC TOB ER 2016 MARC H 2020 Involved in end-to-end recruitment process like sourcing, screening based on customer requirements , on boarding and troubleshooting customers urgent requires. Involved in internal movement of resources such as bench movement, project movement. Co-ordinate internal resources and customer for the flawless execution of projects. Working on Salesforce as an end user to collate the data for weekly/monthly leadership review in the form of PPT/excel reports. Summarizing the issues into a weekly report of management. Track and report project performance and status. Facilitated to work on side projects as needed and assigned by the client. Perform compliance and audit functions which includes meeting with auditors. Organization s internal duties as assigned on adhoc basis. Preparing and maintaining daily, weekly, and monthly reports and dashboard. Reporting Template creations, business opportunities, status reporting, daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, and yearly reports. Project officer with project planning, execution, monitoring and resource balancing skills with ability to support multiple simultaneous tasks in a matrix organizational structure. Represented the team as a single point of contact to external dealers and closely interacted with senior management and executives to align the needs in changing business goals and vision. Project Management with the responsibility for CSAT, attrition, retention, Client Management, Customer interaction and Delivery as per Project Timelines Preparing daily workloads for team coordinating the daily allocation of work Education B. Tech Electronics Communications , Manav Rachna International University, Faridabad, Haryana, Faridabad MAY 2012 J U NE 2016 B. Tech Graduation Degree 2016 in Electronics and Communication Engineering from Manav Rachna International University, Faridabad, Haryana. Senior Secondary School, D. A. V. Public School, Pushpanjali Enclave, Pitampura, New Delhi MARCH 2011 MAR CH 2012 Cleared Senior Secondary level 12th Standard, C. B. S. E Board elementary school academics 2012 in Science Non - Medical with Economics stream. Secondary School, D. A. V. Public School, Pushpanjali Enclave, Pitampura, New Delhi MARCH 2009 MAR CH 2010 Cleared Secondary level 10th Standard, C. B. S. E. Board elementary school academics 2010 . Internships Intern Associate at PwC PricewaterhouseCoopers , Indore JANUAR Y 2016 J U NE 2022 Working as an intern associate in PwC in their project named GRID Government Reforms and Infrastructure Development for introduction to Smart Meters in the city of Indore in alliance with the Government of Madhya Pradesh and MPPMCL Madhya Pradesh Power Management Company Limited . Extra-curricular activities Photography Singing Accomplishments To receive an early promotion as an exceptional Process Star in the team while working in Honeywell presently Resideo as a reward of exemplary performance for three consecutive quarters. To be listed among the best newcomers list in HCL for achieving the highest stack rank rating. Streamlined workflow by consolidating lengthy processes and redundant documentation which resulted in more effective and timely completion of compliances. Summary Detail-orientated PMO Professional adept at making critical decisions, managing deadlines and conducting team reviews. Expertise in analysis and quantitative problem-solving skills, dedicated to company growth and improvements. Qualified with extensive background in advanced management processes utilizing superior communication skills to build meaningful, trusting relationships that exceed client demands. Highly skilled project management professional with outstanding team leadership abilities to meet targets consistently.

Employment History Deputy Project Manager PMO at WIPRO, Noida MAY 2022 Project / Iteration / Delivery planning and execution - Partners with Client, Business Leaders and Team including Wipro Technology / Operation leads / LSA / SA / PTMs / Practice Managers / Health Leaders and other support groups for Client or Client Delivery group to plan, execute, monitor, control, report Project / Delivery / Iteration deliverables Change Management: - Identifies and understands the change. Plans and prepares self and the team to navigate for effective implementation of change - Effectively communicates through the change management process and reinforces behaviors toward the desired state - Sustains the change through identified metrics, assigned ownership, and a procedure for monitoring and addressing slippages Stakeholder and Relationship Management: - Develops strong working relationships with Team, Client and Business leaders and works closely on development and achievement of strategic objectives. - Displays strong business acumen to address escalations with business stakeholders, and facilitates an open, constructive dialogue with stakeholders on key issues and risks. - Utilizes strong oral and written communication skills to effectively communicate at multiple levels of the organization and with external partners, both technical and business aligned. Issue Risk Management: - Proactively identifies and implements risk mitigation strategies and aggressively manages the resolution of issues. - Facilitates actions to remove risks/issues/barriers outside of the meeting. Quality Management: - Sets/ shares quality expectations and goals for the team. - Owns the continuous improvement agenda for aligned clients. - Perform operational and compliance audits with the team. People Management - Nurturing the team: - Builds relationships, assesses performance, provides career and development coaching, manages pay, and improves colleague engagement. Timesheet Compliance on Weekly basis in Clarity PPM tool Creating WBS / Allocating resources to WBS Maintain Track contract agreements - SOW, MSA, PO To prepare resource utilization report Billable / Non-Billable. Hobbies Driving, Passion to learn something new, exploring new type of cuisines across various food joints/outlets.
